problem.markdown:
>>1. When the hydrogen ion concentration of a solution increases the solution is called as<< (x) Acidic ( ) Basic ( ) Neural
>>2) The pH of a neutral solution is<< ( ) 0 (x) 7 ( ) 14
>>3) The pH scale generally ranges from<< (x) 0 to 14 ( ) -14 to 14 ( ) -7 to 7
>>4) PH of distilled water is<< ( ) 0 (x) 7 ( ) 14
>>5) Buffer solutions are used as a means of keeping pH at a nearly ----- value in a wide variety of chemical applications.<< ( ) High (x) Constant ( ) Neutral
>>6) Conductivity of a pure and distilled water is<< ( ) High ( ) Low (x) Zero
>>7) The current through the solution takes place through the movement of<< (x) Electrically charged particles ( ) Chemically charged particles ( ) Magnetically charged particles
>>8) The SI unit of conductivity is<< ( ) Ohms ( ) Ohms per meter (x) Siemens per meter
